name: ted-tender-crawler
title: TED Tender Crawler - European Procurement Intelligence
description: Professional Apify actor for searching and monitoring European public procurement tenders from TED.EU with intelligent filtering, relevance scoring, and industry templates. Built for businesses, consultants, and researchers tracking EU opportunities.
seoTitle: TED Tender Crawler - European Procurement Intelligence
seoDescription: Professional Apify actor for automated search and monitoring of European public procurement tenders with intelligent filtering, relevance scoring, industry templates, and real-time data from TED.EU database.

dataset.title: TED Tender Results
dataset.description: Filtered and scored tender opportunities from TED.EU
